model_answer: The events that most directly cause the result sub-event are: A) Event 6: The speaker, alongside a Swiss Ramble owners’ funding graphic, claims United are the only club paying dividends to owners and have paid more to owners than for players. C) Event 5: The speaker angrily states the club is being used as a “cash cow,” dismissing transfer spend as irrelevant because money is being taken out into the Glazers’ pockets. D) Event 11: The speaker references Ferguson’s 2006–2009 team and says their success happened in spite of the Glazers.
